headline: CME Group (CME) Plans Index for Mexican Equity Market Exposure
summary: CME Group Inc. (NASDAQ:CME) is one of the 12 best cryptocurrency and blockchain stocks to buy. On June 17, the company announced plans to launch E-Mini S&P BMV IPC Index futures, pending regulatory review. The new index seeks to offer broad exposure to the Mexican Equity Market in the future. It will track the most […]

headline: CME Group to Launch FTSE CoreCommodity CRB Futures on July 21
summary: CME Group, the world's leading derivatives marketplace, today announced plans to launch FTSE CoreCommodity CRB futures, pending regulatory review.

headline: 4 Crypto-Centric Stocks to Watch as Bitcoin Rebounds to Resume Rally
summary: As Bitcoin rebounds past $105K after a ceasefire, CME, ACN, V and PYPL emerge as crypto-centric stocks with upside potential.
